description:
Due to a project with a magazine, the members of Marginal #4 are to show off their rooms.
Even though everybody brings in a wide variety of interesting pictures, the one that drew the most attention was Rui`s.
In a otherwise modern and simple room, there is a strange stuffed character.
The rest of the group simply cannot help but wonder why Rui would have something that atypical....
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 過去から妄想[もそ]るダークマター
